about_the_game:
This Downloadable Content Pack includes the highly detailed Conrail - GE C40-8 model for use in the Trainz Simulator franchise games.

Features Include:

Night Lighting
Ditch Lights
Auto Running Numbers
Custom Cab
Animated Wipers
Marker Lights
Fire Script
